pr_title: issue #1216 - Generate model constraints for value set bindings

@@ -1492,7 +1492,7 @@ public class CodeGenerator {
      * @param className
      *            the class name
      * @param lastId
-     *            the ID of the last contraint
+     *            the ID of the last constraint
      */

timeline.bodyText: wondering if you need the 'at least' part in the description - I think 'SHALL, if possible, contain a code from value set' and 'SHOULD contain a code from value set' works
timeline.author: michaelwschroeder

replies.bodyText: I can remove the words "at least".
replies.author: tbieste
